dta.Time¶

class dta.Time(hours, minutes)¶

Bases: datetime.time

Class that represents a time (without a specific date). Adds a few simple methods to the standard python datetime.time class.

__init__(hours, minutes)¶

Methods

__init__(hours, minutes)
fromMinutes(minutes) Return a Time object that has the same number of minutes and the input arguments
getMinutes() Return the number of minutes from 0:00AM that
readFromString(timeAsString) Read a string representing time in the format %H:%M e.g. 16:30

dst¶

Return self.tzinfo.dst(self).

classmethod fromMinutes(minutes)¶

Return a Time object that has the same number of minutes and the input arguments

getMinutes()¶

Return the number of minutes from 0:00AM that correspond to the hours and minutes of this object.
